title: Matchmaking penalty
body:
Hey guys and girls, last night I was having a game of ranked and all was well besides my constant ping spikes of up to 800-1500 at times. Around level 10-11 I decided enough was enough and i'll reset my new router (NBN). Shortly after I realised this was a terrible terrible idea, as I struggled big time getting it back online. 10 minutes had passed and my angry and annoyed self finally got connected, however when loading up league it came up with a disconnect issue and once more I had troubles coming back into the game. It than went pear shaped again, with me needing to reset my computer as I would click league, the icon would appear in the middle of the screen, but disappearing shortly after and nothing continuing from that. 

Due to this I discovered I got a matching penalty of 20 minutes before finding a game, which I believe can be fair. However I do feel a little upset due to me trying really hard to get back online and not let my teammates down with no success. I was just wondering if there is a place to contact a riot employee / helper to maybe discuss it a little more? 

I'm really not sure, I just thought i'd give it a crack. :) :)

replies.body:
I know it's frustrating trying to get back into a match when your connection just won't work with you, but being afk from a match still puts your other teammates at a disadvantage. You shouldn't have too many games to play through though if this is your first time with this issue!

Those major ping spikes concerned me a bit, so I'd like to go ahead and check for packet loss if you'd like. Hit up our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and let it scan the network logs from that game with the 1500 ping. Post a screenshot of it here so I can go over it with you!
